quotes: Take responsibility of your own happiness, never put it in other people's hands.
Death and life have their determined appointments; riches and honors depend upon heaven.
Nothing is really work unless you would rather be doing something else.
Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
Every man gotta right to decide his own destiny.
There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power or our will.
When it hurts - observe. Life is trying to teach you something.
None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free.
How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.
We become what we believe.
You want to live but do you know how to live? You are scared of dying and tell me, is the kind of life you lead really any different from being dead?
Success comes from knowing that you did your best to become the best that you are capable of becoming.
We build too many walls and not enough bridges.
Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet.
Words can only have a positive effect on others if and when they are ready to listen.
The way of success is the way of continuous pursuit of knowledge.
If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
A zen master's life is one continuous mistake.
Rest in reason; move in passion.
You need to be doing fewer things for more effect instead of doing more things with side effects.
Don't blame others. it won't make you a better person.
I believe that potential is unlimited - success depends on daring to act on dreams.
Happiness depends on your mindset and attitude.
If we know how to adapt, we end up being superior.
Think and wonder, wonder and think.
It is very obvious that we are not influenced by 'facts' but by our interpretation of the facts.
Show kindness but never expect it. Show authenticity but never expect it. Only the wise are indifferent to things they can't control.
Keep your dreams, you never know when you might need them.
Ability is a poor man's wealth.
Focused, hard work is the real key to success.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you've imagined.
Not engaging in ignorance is wisdom.
I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
Our stories may be singular, but our destination is shared.
Do it with passion, or not at all.
We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.
Stop being a prisoner of your past. Become the architect of your future.
At every moment where language can't go, that's your mind.
Happiness is a choice, not a result. Nothing will make you happy until you choose to be happy.
All human wisdom is contained in these two words - Wait and Hope
Normality is a paved road: It's comfortable to walk,? but no flowers grow on it.
The score never interested me, only the game.
Make your life a mission - not an intermission.
A man that flies from his fear may find that he has only taken a short cut to meet it.
If you want to achieve anything in this world, you have to get used to the idea that not everyone will like you.
Discipline is the mark of intelligent living.
If you're really truthful with yourself, it's a wonderful guidance.
Fear of death is fear of the Unknown.
Without education, we are in a horrible and deadly danger of taking educated people seriously.
The worst part of success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
